title: Introduction_to_seahtrue
text: Version 0.1.0 Seahtrue package contains run_seahtrue function, located master.R /R directory. function performs required steps current version package.

what: Step 1 and 2: Loading and validating input.
title: Introduction_to_seahtrue
text: function loads Seahorse Excel file input, requires full path Excel file. Excel input validated. make sure contains Seahorse data required analysis.

what: Step 3 and 4: Preprocessing and validating preprocessed data.
title: Introduction_to_seahtrue
text: next step analysis preprocess Seahorse Excel data loaded validated previous step. preprocess step produces dataset preprocessed data. preprocessed dataset validated check seahorse data meets criteria. Seahorse data contains unexpected data, doesn’t meet validation criteria, warning given. Note Seahtrue analysis still performed validation doesn’t meet criteria. summary preprocessing mandatory step make sure Seahtrue calculation work well.

title: Introduction_to_seahtrue
text: main workflow seahtrue run using function run_seahtrue. function currently fulfills 4 different purposes: Validates input data Reads input data Preprocesses input data Validates preprocess output

title: Introduction_to_seahtrue
text: eventual output preprocessed dataset. following output returned step 3.

title: Introduction_to_seahtrue
text: examples preprocessed output data version 0.1.0 Seahtrue package. use PBMC seahorse Excel data input. Excel data converted using Seahorse .asyr output generated Agilent Wave Software. make sure run_seahtrue function runs properly can use following PBMC datasets: * 20191219_SciRep_PBMCs_donor_A.xlsx * 20200110_SciRep_PBMCs_donor_B.xlsx * 20200110_SciRep_PBMCs_donor_C.xlsx seahorse datasets located inst/extdata directory. installing seahtrue dataset located installation location seahtrue, access location make use system.file() provided ‘base’ R.

title: Introduction to Seahtrue
text: Seahtrue package introduces notable refinements realm OCR ECAR calculations, enhancing ability analyze cellular respiration metabolic processes. improvements characterized :

title: Introduction to Seahtrue
text: software Agilent called Wave used conducting experiments systems. Seahorse data can obtained/visualized using Wave. However, Wave’s current software drawbacks measuring OCR. drawbacks may affect results, may lead aberrant OCR. abnormal OCR , example, lead incorrect research conclusions regarding energy management cells. Hence, script written overcome drawbacks. Advantages Seahtrue Agilent’s Wave:

title: Introduction to Seahtrue
text: Seahorse XF systems Agilent, scientists able get information biological energy transduction mitochondrial functions cells. Biological energy transduction base physiological phenomena cells. metabolic processes associated energy transduction related diseases diabetes, cancer, rare genetic disease aberrant cell death (1). Agilent’s systems capable measuring oxygen concentration pH within cell culture medium. O2/pH measured fluorescent probes (sensitive O2/pH). Probes placed just samples (cultured cells). result small chamber microliters. small volume makes possible measure changes O2 concentration pH. Cells use oxigen make ATP mitochondria. results decreased oxygen concentration medium due mitochondrial activity. Oxygen consumption expressed oxygen consumption rate (OCR). Cells produce lactate burning glucose glycolysis. Lactate (part) responsible acidification medium. change pH called extracellular acidification rate (ECAR). Mitochondrial cell respiration (oxidative phosphorylation) glycolysis (non-mitochondrial) can indirectly quantified using OCR ECAR. processes contribute production ATP mammals (2). ATP energy carrier provides cells energy. method scientists get insight energy management cells.

title: Introduction to Seahtrue
text: Seahtrue script consists several parts: Seahorse Excel files loaded Seahtrue. Agilent Wave software automatically generates test results (.asyr) data. data converted Excel file (.xls). Wave includes function realize conversion. Useful information extracted Excel file. Information considered useful ’s relevant end user. example, ’s useful get metadata project/experiment. Also data regarding Seahtrue calculations important. example, oxigen pH related calculations require ‘O2 mmhg’ ‘pH’ data ‘Raw’ sheet Seahorse Excel file. data can make calculations regarding OCR ECAR. Calculations applied, including calulations measure Oxigen Consumption rate (OCR) Extracellular acidification rate (ECAR). performed Wave alternative Seahtrue method. Calculations performed data background wells cell-containing wells. Relevant information visualized plots. (See heading ‘Figure’ ‘Application’) Note 1: vignette show chronological procedure seahtrue script. interactive seahtrue Shiny app, don’t pursue chronological order. example, user may decide plot visualised ’s possible skip unwanted plots. possible due ‘reactivity’. Shiny application make Seahtrue userfriendly. Note 2: Seahtrue allows us perform calculations (OCR, ECAR fluorescence (AU)) Seahorse data. expect Seahtrue perform better certain results. still requires prove.

title: Introduction to Seahtrue
text: Read nessecary Seahorse information Excel file, including data ‘Assay Configuration’ ‘Raw’ sheet. tibble data returned.

title: Introduction to Seahtrue
text: preprocess returned plate_df (containing nessary Seahorse data need). preprocess_plate_data function preprocesses data : changing columns names adding new time columns adding injection info columns add plate_id column calculating background data calculating raw pH emission data nested tibble returned, containing information need perform Seahtrue calculations. Note: nested tibble includes raw data ‘Raw’ Seahorse xls datasheet) Information received ‘Raw’ Seahorse datasheet. Information received ‘Assay information’ Seahorse datasheet.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Vincent de Boer. Maintainer, author. Xiang Zhang. Contributor. Gerwin Smits. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: de Boer V, Zhang X, Smits G (2024). Seahtrue package extracellular flux analysis. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/vcjdeboer/seahtrue.

what: Seahtrue revives XF data for structured data analysis
title: Seahtrue revives XF data for structured data analysis
text: seahtrue package analyzing extracellular flux data. organizes data excel files nested tibbles allows multi-experiment analysis detailed raw data processing.

title: Seahtrue revives XF data for structured data analysis
text: can install latest version seahtrue following command:
code: devtools::install_github("vcjdeboer/seahtrue", ref = "main") #> Downloading GitHub repo vcjdeboer/seahtrue@main #> knitr (1.45 -> 1.46) [CRAN] #> Installing 1 packages: knitr #> Installing package into '/private/var/folders/27/brlq29b170xfkshv_mmttv3c0000gn/T/RtmpLFfu6e/temp_libpath2d1b69833ab3' #> (as 'lib' is unspecified) #>  #> The downloaded binary packages are in #>  /var/folders/27/brlq29b170xfkshv_mmttv3c0000gn/T//RtmpKMtlil/downloaded_packages #> ── R CMD build ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> * checking for file ‘/private/var/folders/27/brlq29b170xfkshv_mmttv3c0000gn/T/RtmpKMtlil/remotes31155a0a2615/vcjdeboer-seahtrue-91fe92c/DESCRIPTION’ ... title: Seahtrue revives XF data for structured data analysis
text: need assistance want learn Seahtrue package can utilize documentation page package (?seahtrue). provide links documentation different functions well links general Seahorse background information related package.

title: Seahtrue revives XF data for structured data analysis
text: Suggestions improvements welcome! feedback Seahtrue package comes improvements bugs, let us know. input valuable can help us make Seahtrue better.

what: seahtrue: Seahtrue revives XF data for structured data analysis — seahtrue-package
title: seahtrue: Seahtrue revives XF data for structured data analysis — seahtrue-package
text: Seahtrue organizes data experiments performed XF analyzer structured nested tibbles. allows detailed processing raw data advanced data visualization statistics. Seahtrue version introduces open reproducible way analyze XF experiments. uses file paths XF Excel files. files created assay result files (.asyr) derived Agilent Seahorse XF Wave software. contain different sheets important data experiment: 1. Assay Information: Details experiment set . 2. Rate Data: Information OCR ECAR rates. 3. Raw Data: original raw data collected experiment. 4. Calibration Data: Data related calibrating instrument. Seahtrue version focuses getting specific data needed analysis. data extracted, prepared calculations preprocessing. make sure everything accurate, initial data preprocessed data go thorough checks.

title: seahtrue: Seahtrue revives XF data for structured data analysis — seahtrue-package
text: Maintainer: Vincent de Boer vincent.deboer@wur.nl Authors: Gerwin Smits contributors: Xiang Zhang [contributor]
